channel.title: Getting-starteds on Arc
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on Arc

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Directed Acyclic Graphs A pipeline is a Directed Acyclic Graph specified using a json file format with the sequence of transformation stages defined in the stages array. Consider the following data pipeline: The job logically executes in the following way: Branch One (in parallel with Branch Two) The DelimitedExtract stage loads Comma separated files from hdfs://datalake/raw/customer/*.csv and named customerUntypedDF internally. The TypingTransform stage takes the customerUntypedDF dataset and performs data typing on it using the metadata defined at hdfs://datalake/meta/0.
